posts.title: Color Changing LED Drumsticks
posts.content: Light up your performance with more than just your amazing percussions when you play with these color changing LED drumsticks. These high tech drumsticks are fitted with a small LED that makes the entire stick glow in one of seven eye catching colors.

posts.title: Floating Beer Pong Table
posts.content: Ensure your guests remain good and drunk during your next pool party by hosting a beer pong tournament on this floating table. Made from a lightweight and durable tear resistant foam, it’s designed to fit standard 16 oz party cups and rolls up for easy transport.

posts.title: Bulletproof Shotglass
posts.content: Take a shot to the face in more ways than one by drinking your favorite poison from these bulletproof shotglasses. Made from high quality glass, each one of these 1.5 ounce shot glasses creates the illusion they’re being penetrated by an incoming bullet.

posts.title: UV Exposure Monitoring Bracelet
posts.content: Avoid overexposure while under the sun by putting on this UV monitor bracelet. After setting your skin color and sensitivity, the bracelet reads your UV exposure throughout the day and flashes a bright light when you’ve reached a healthy limit.

posts.title: BBQ Toolbox
posts.content: Set up an impromptu barbecue at nearly any pleasant location by bringing along this BBQ toolbox to the picnic. It sports a durable toolbox exterior that makes it remarkably portable and opens up to reveal a main grill, warming grill, and a storage area.

posts.title: What’s Your Poo Telling You?
posts.content: Monitor your body’s health every time you drop a chocolate dragon inside the porcelain goddess by consulting “What’s Your Poo Telling You?”. Inside you’ll find illustrated and witty descriptions of over two dozen types of poo with accurate medical explanations.

posts.title: Firefighter Bed Set
posts.content: Fulfill your child’s dreams of becoming a brave firefighter with the firefighter bed set. Once your ambitious offspring is tucked in, the realistic fireman uniform emblazoned on the comforter and pillow case transforms him/her into a heroic firefighter.

posts.title: Powdered Peanut Butter
posts.content: Enjoy a healthy snack without sacrificing flavor by seasoning your meals with powered peanut butter. Made from all natural ingredients including roasted peanuts, sugar, and salt, this gluten-free treat provides a great taste and an even greater source of protein.

posts.title: Light & Massage Therapy Hairbrush
posts.content: Help your hair grow thicker and healthier by brushing it with this light and massage therapy hairbrush. The brush comes outfitted with 20 energy inducing 660 nanometer LED lights and a vibrating feature that helps increase blood circulation to the hair follicles.

posts.title: Ball Claw
posts.content: Display your autographed ball on your wall with ease thanks to the ball claw. Available in soccer ball, baseball, football, and basketball style claws, these handy wall mounts are great for showing off your prized possessions, or just keeping your floor free of loose balls.

posts.title: Roll Up Electronic Drum Kit
posts.content: Work on your drumming skills anywhere without disrupting others using this roll up electronic drum kit.  It rolls up for easy transport and includes 2 foot pedals and 9 different drum pads that are capable of reproducing a range of sounds and beats.

posts.title: Penguin Shaped Paper Clips
posts.content: Add some levity to your dull workday by keeping those TPS reports organized using these penguin shaped paper clips.  These novelty paper clips come molded in the shape of a playful and helpful penguin you can use for work or to play with.
